channel.title: Java noob requires install assistance
channel.description:
Ok I'm sorry I have to ask this but I've tried tutorial and tutorial and tutorial, I'm trying to get Crimson Editor to work on my comp for school, this boards tutorial helped me get to where it actually recognizes thers a JDK on my system and can actually compile stuff. So I go to run my script and the T/IO screen pops up for a second, dissappears and then I've got nothing, Some help for mega noob here would be greatly appreciated. thats been fixed.
So I changed a bit of my Script around, went to compile, now it reads everything super quick - Am i being stupid and missing a step here? :confused: Your time is appreciated. feel free to PM

item.title: Java noob requires install assistance
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Put a ‘pause’ at the end of your script.

Read full topic
